```{r}
# xmin        : 419971.5 
# xmax        : 521239.5 
# ymin        : 4924218 
# ymax        : 5029162 

library(data.table)
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(raster)
library(dplyr)
library(rgdal)
library(rgeos)

extent(landcover)
e <- as(extent(460000, 465000, 4980000, 4990000), 'SpatialPolygons')
crs(landcover)
crs(e) <- "+proj=utm +zone=15 +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0,0,0,0,0 +units=m +no_defs"
crs(e)
cropped2 <- raster::crop(landcover,e)
plot(cropped2, axes = TRUE)





```
